Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Hey, guys! Look at us and support us. We are working for you   By the way. My answer to CEO and Founder of TOP ICO list. Sometimes we have to tell people what we are expecting and who we are.  Hello, Henrik.  Thanks for the final reminder as a attempt to get my attention.  Why we should pay 0.5 eth? What will we get instead? Some sort of text and information which we provided to you listed on your web site? Well, I don' think that it cost 0,5 eth.  Maybe, you have a great community which you built by listing different ICOs. And most possibly when your site was young you did it for free.  As a team we are getting ton of such offers every day and everybody ask for money. Look, we run ICO to rise money. Not to spend.  Of cause, with your community we can rise more or much faster. But can you say true - are you sure that your site will give us investors or you just want to earn 0,5 eth? If you are sure that you built great community which ready to support smart ideas - let's make a deal. We will pay you twice if your site will give us investors.  So, let me ask again are you sure?  Alexey  PS When we ask for money we are sure that we will give what we promised. Without any exceptions or excuses. Want some of our products - we can bake it. You will taste it and pay if you get what we promised.

Author: EvaCoinCEO
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Important update about our bounty campaign.  We launched first phase of bounty campaign on December 8. For social networks only (twitter, Instagram, Facebook). By the terms of the campaign all participants have been warned that each participant will be personally reviewed by the EvaCoin team. Yesterday we analyzed all 36 requests. We looked at twitter and Facebook accounts of the participants. We did not find any real accounts which will be really helpful for the project promotion. We know the cost of such accounts. So, all participants have been declined. We repeatedly told that our project is unique, and we don't need HYIP on re posts of "unreal" accounts.  So, today we have a decision - we don't accept such quality of bounty. This format is not acceptable for us.  EvaCoin is a digital asset based on the real business. So each token for us and for our token holders is convertible to real money and we do care about token price.  EvaCoin team is ready to pay for unique and non standard ways of promotion and unique ideas which people could offer. It is outside of the forum concept where people usually provide comments or re-posts without full understanding of their own activities.  We don't need artificial interest to our project. Because such kind of interest is worse than nothing for us. We are looking for the people who will share our ideas, our concept and our business.  Important fact that we think about people who will be working for us through bounty campaign BEFORE promise something. Our project initially based on the trust and if we promise something we should keep our promises. Which means, that in case soft cap will not be reached - we should take real money and pay to people for their job. Why real money? Once again, because our token is a digital asset and we do CARE about it and the future of EvaCoin.  We will be glad to discuss any unique offers to promote our project. And we are ready to pay for these ideas because bounty fund is full now.

Author: EvaCoinCEO
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Each token holder has a "vote" inside the SIMT. And each token holder can share ideas inside the SIMT. Other token holders support or decline ideas by using their vote. We don't assign weight to vote. I mean, 1 token has the same vote "weight" as 1000 tokens in one hands. The difference is only in dividends payed to 1 token and 1000 tokens.

Author: EvaCoinCEO
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Continue to explain SIMT concept.  Imagine, that you have business and you are CEO. Everyday you get a lot of information about sales, people, business process, warehouse status, employees etc. All this information need to be analyzed. Next, based on the analyses, CEO or managers should make a decision which (as a result) will generate more profit OR less profit. That's simply it.  With SIMT and investors inside we will be using the crowd insight. Look at these 2 words.  Investors insight inside the IT tool.  Investors will have all information about business which generate profit. How to get more profit? Through analysis. Our information is our "big data". And we are inviting our investors to look at this data, provide analysis, get support from other by voting. Everybody interested to earn more in this model. Yes, it is inside pastry business. But does it really matter? In this industry it is absolutely necessary as nowhere. McDonalds did it by optimization. But why only burgers?  Block chain here is used as a technology which delivers trust between different people. But people work on optimization.

Author: EvaCoinCEO
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Do you know the main wish of the CEOs or top-management in the Global corporation? They always ask for IDEAS which could make business better and earn more money. And they ask employees for ideas. What we can do better then now?  Why it doesn't work? Because employees will not get more then salary. Employees come to do what management say. That's it.  We offer new model.

Author: EvaCoinCEO
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: This is the the great question. It is in top-3 frequently asked questions. Let me try to provide you alternative answer on this question and try to share some examples.  While reading comments in the RU thread we saw that some people perceive block chain linked to cryptocurrency and forgot that concept of the block chain is that many people can write entries into a record of information, and a community of users can control how the record of information is amended and updated. Likewise, Wikipedia entries are not the product of a single publisher. No one person controls the information.  So, the key principles of the block chain technology is transparent and trusted entries made by different people. Block chain built from 3 technologies: private key cryptography, p2p network and protocol (platform). This technology allows people to communicate in a new way.  Let's simply imagine how it will be working for us.  Just imagine that you are a Starbucks share holder. And as a share holder and investor you are interesting to receive true information about company's activity. Because true information is a basis for correct analysis. Today such information is distributed through periodical reports generated by company's employees. How do you think, what is the chance to get valid and undistorted information in this case?  Now imagine, that all key data is been regularly written to the block chain - to the decentralized database. This information 100% valid and can not be changed by someone's decision. Returning to our example with Starbucks - you, as a share holder, will be getting information in real time. All what you need to do now is to make analysis and to make a decisions about your intentions to retain or sell your shares.  The next expected question will be - if I can do good analysis why I can't give advises to the company's management (even to CEO) on how to improve things in business and rise a share cost?  Both situations are not possible in the real world simply because company did not have technologies to do that. But now we have it and we are going to use block chain as a technology which simply give us opportunity to communicate with our investors and here their voice and opinion.  So, we, as a company offers you our token which will give you access to all key information (including financial information, information about management's decisions, strategy, product production processes and other internal strictly closed information). Also out token gives you a chance to share your voice, your opinion or your ideas based on your own analysis of information which you have and see in the real time.  And important thing - if you don't want to do any kind of analysis or don't want to see company's key information don't use these opportunities and Just receive our dividends and trust management's decisions and strategy.  I think, it will be good to say that we are the first company who offers this business model and new level of relationships with investors. In the industry, which today is undervalued by new technologies.  The greatest and the most efficient way to implement our block chain based IT tool is to do this in the real business and use it as a lab to test this tool. With your help.

Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT

Author: EvaCoinCEO
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Thank you so much for your question.  First of all, our business does not use platform business model. We are traditional non-platform Company with linear business model but at the same time we developed a unique business model. And you are right, platform business needs much more money for development.  So, if we turn over your question with new understanding of our business model hard cap $750k will be clearly reasonable. Some points "why: with facts (underlined) which allow us to save money:   - we built our first restaurant and bakery production and have cost of it (save on research).  - as business owners, we have strong calculation of everything what we promise (we have experience).  - we don't use expensive services (which, for example, Ambisafe or ICOS offer) to promote our project because hard cap will be much higher in this way and who will pay for these services? Our investors. (it is reasonable to think about investor's profit and future coin cost)  - we don't use ICO to rise as much more money as we can because we know almost exact amount of money we need. (planned development)  - we know every point in our costings. From chair cost to taxes. Such knowledge are expensive. But we already payed to get them. (we spend our first investments wisely)  We will spend money exactly the way described in the WP and you can control the process because we will be building things in the real world. So, each of us can "touch" it. It is impossible to "hide" equipment, bakery staff, people, reputation, history. So, we are clearly opened here. And we consistently do the same way - built and ask for investments. Built and ask for investments. We use ICO stage to realize our expansion inside the Russia and present our innovative IT tool. We have clear plan of our actions described in the White Paper.

Author: SkvortsovIM
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: We plan to fundraise in 3 steps, like a venture investments. We're going to have a traction between all of them and everyone can see, that we make revenue and everyone will receive dividends monthly. That's why we don't try to get $5M right now. We don't need this amount of money now. This money is necessary for further development of the business and we'll get it when we're going to scale.  ICO would be launched in a few steps:  Pre-sale (Dec 2017). You can now apply to our WHITELIST by email: tokensale@evabonbons.ru Sales of only 4% from the total number of tokens. Cap - $25,000. Price 1 EVA = $0.33 Conditions of investment at Pre-Sale stage: 100% bonus. Minimum amount of investment is 1 ETH.  The funds raised will be spent on advertising campaign and marketing of the main round of ICO and EVABOBONS brand promotion.  ICO(Feb 2018). Sales of 78% from the total number of tokens. Cap - $750,000. Price 1 EVA = $0.33 Conditions of investment during the period of ICO: Minimum amount of investment is 0.01 ETH Within the period of 0 – 24 hrs from the beginning of ICO the bonus is 50%, 20% from the total number of tokens is available. Within the period of 24 – 48 hrs from the beginning of ICO the bonus is 25%, 25% from the total number of tokens is available. Within the period of 48 – end hrs from the beginning of ICO the bonus is 0%  The funds raised will be spent on construction of the chain consisting of 7 pastry cafes located in RF. Primary development of SIMT. EVABOBONS brand promotion.  Additional issue of EVACOIN (after payback ~oктябpь 2019). Cap ~ $5,000,000.  Up to 10% of additional issued tokens will be distributed among holders of EVACOIN tokens issued at the initial coin offering as a bonus as an expression of the Company’s gratitude to investors who joined the Project at an early stage (the maximum size of the bonus will make 100% from the stock owned by an investor).  The funds raised will be spent on expanding the business, entering international markets and sales of franchises, development of SIMT.

Author: SkvortsovIM
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Initially, we were building a business by investing into it all of our money and time. We earned money and invested it into the business again, receiving invaluable experience. The road from dream to reality turned out to be long and difficult but, at the same time, exciting. Despite all difficulties, we can say with all the confidence that we like to run this business.  As of today, the total amount of money invested makes $135 000. 3 key stages have been covered. The first experimental coffee and pastry cafe was opened - EvaBonBons Bakery. First steps were made towards construction of the international chain. When the first pastry cafe was being constructed, we received an investment proposal that fit into our understanding of the business structure and the concept of the chain development in the most natural way. This was a landmark – appearance of the first external capital in our business. The amount of investments made $30 000 and the investor took such a liking of our ideas that he became a rightful member of EVABONBONS® team. Creating the brand (at the moment, EVABONBONS® brand is registered in the territory of the Russian Federation) we were, first of all, thinking about the future. That is why it is important to give you the layout of our strategic goals:  •   Construction of our own chain of pastry cafes •   Primary development of IT tool powered by crowd insight -  Smart Investment Management Tool (SIMT) •   Preparation of the franchise •   Setting up an international chain, scaling of the business based on a franchising technique •   Bringing the Company to IPO  The above strategic goals help us to maintain the focus on the main things while we develop the brand and the Company and thus avoid locking ourselves into minor issues and details of a routine work.

Author: SkvortsovIM
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Our story began in 2012 with the idea of Vera Osinina (founder and pastry chef of EVABONBONS® brand) to open a small and cozy pastry cafe. Over the next five years we worked our way from a small homemade online pastry cafe up to the first experimental cafe with an open production hall, and the dream to open a coffee and pastry cafe grew into the idea to set up an international chain of coffee and pastry bars that make products of the highest quality, fair pricing policy, high service level and with the help of a unique management tool.

Author: SkvortsovIM
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Business development and management will be implemented through the tool of group decision making (or Smart Investment Management Tool).  PRINCIPLES OF SIMT OPERATION:  All the information about the chain operation (cloud cash boxes, OPEX, purchase of ingredients, banks’ commissions, salary fund, taxes and levies, rental fee, utensils, promotion expenses, etc.) is available for analysis in SIMT Access to SIMT will be provided to holders of EVACOIN tokens Strategic Project roadmap of the chain with a high detalization degree in presented in SIMT Investors (holders of EVACOIN tokens) can assess every item of Strategic Project roadmap, make their own alternative proposal/amendment and lobby proposals of other SIMT users Decision making at the risk of your own capital is the guarantee of making a responsible, well considered decision On condition a proposal made an investor is approved by a big number of users (holders of EVACOIN tokens), it is brought for consideration of CEO and the Company’s management The sum-total of assessments of items of Strategic Development Plan of the Chain of Pastry Cafes form the integrated assessment of CEO and Company’s management activity every reporting period (one month). This will be an internal index of approval of the Company’s management operation Key financial and management data is written to Ethereum based registry daily  With the help of SIMT an investor will get the opportunity to see all the processes from the inside, correctly evaluate the business potential, team’s operation and, most importantly, at any moment, impact the development of the business by proposing their alternative solution to a task after the support of the majority of users has been obtained. The IT tool, developed within the framework of the Project, is a “consigliere” in the business with opportunities of collective intelligence, diffusion of investors into the Project. Through this tool, one SIMT user has the voting right and the opportunity to be heard by the majority. On condition there is transparency of internal technological and business processes, SIMT will not only allow to correct the faults made within the shortest possible period of time, but also suggest weighed strategic decisions for further development.  Applying SIMT, the level of trust to the Project will be equal to 100%, that will allow to raise therequired amounts in order to achieve the set targets, and the rate of development of the Project will be sweepingly fast.

Author: SkvortsovIM
Title: EVACOIN BLOCKCHAIN BI SOLUTION POWERED by CROWD INSIGHT
Body: Click to explore financial indicators and ratios p.19-28  In order to evaluate operational efficiency of the monetary unit, a digital economic model was developed within the tangible asset (chain of pastry cafes) that incorporates statistical data obtained over the years of work on the Project. The model uses a big number of variable parameters, such as: CAPEX for opening one pastry bar, rental fee, hourly wages of staff, maximum efficiency of a pastry chef and barista, forecasted number of visitors, distribution of revenue between the pastry cafe and the delivery service, revenue distribution by time of the day, days of the week, size of an average bill, self cost of ingredients, duration of various stages in the period of opening of a new pastry cafe.  Big bonuses have strong mathematical explanation. Just 4% of all token holders will get maximum bonuses and 400% profit in 20 month.  Investment cashflow forms two types of assets: tangible and intangible assets.  We justified every calculated parameter to obtain the most realistic forecast of financial result of operation of the chain of pastry cafe.  The forecasted period of return on investments involved in generation of the tangible asset makes 13 months. At stage four of the Project, with appearance of such factors as: investments into intangible assets (SIMT, bounty campaigns, remuneration of sponsors and bonuses at Pre-Sale, the real period of time increases up to 18-20 months.    Click to explore economic model
